thread.title: Taylor Sather
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Taylor Sather

author: Taylor Sather
title: Taylor Sather
text: I have been wanting to purchase the bbg guide for a little over a year but being in college, the regular price just wasn't an option for me. The discount allowed me to purchase and I am already making steps towards improving myself. I love Kayla's mission statement and am loving the workouts so far! I received the pdf seconds after purchase so I knew it was the real deal. There have been follow up emails to make sure I'm happy which says a lot about the company. Extremely happy with this purchase.
